text: in the NHL knowing which team has
possession of the puck only tells a
small part of the story of A game
perception isn't always reality and
Diving deeper to understand which team
really has earned control of the game is
the premise for ice tilt a new metric
from NHL Edge IQ powered by AWS ice tilt
helps reveal which team is territorially
dominating the ice in key periods of the
game and also the margin of that
advantage to calculate ice tilt
gigabytes of data are analyzed from the
NHL Edge Puck and player tracking system
this NHL Edge system continuously tracks
the positioning of players for ice tilt
Gathering and transmitting over 1300
data points per second using a number of
AWS tools and services to analyze this
data ice tilt continually measures the
average location of the play over a
rolling 2-minute segment to help
quantify which which team owns the ice
throughout the game this helps provide
fans a new lens to understand game
momentum and can also be used to examine
the impact of events during the game
such as a particular line change power
play game stoppage or adjustment to
strategy simply by measuring the ensuing
ice tilt analysis of a fast-paced game
requires fast-paced processing power AWS
technology is matching the action of the
NHL Moment by moment offering hands a
new window into what's really happening
on the
ice
